Since the radius of the sector is 3 cm, the distance from the origin to the center of the inscribed circle is $3-r$.
By Pythagorean theorem, the distance from the center of the inscribed circle to the origin is $r\sqrt{2}$. Therefore $r\sqrt{2} = 3-r$.
Solving for $r$:
$r\sqrt{2} = 3 - r$
$r\sqrt{2} + r = 3$
$r(\sqrt{2}+1) = 3$
